WRITING.TEXT: Yeah, it would serve drinks. I thought about getting a job at a club, but I life in a rural area so there aren't any around, which is one reason why I had the idea.

WRITING.TITLE: Looking for some basic advice on starting a business.
WRITING.TEXT: Brand new to this sub, so I have super limited knowledge. I'm an 18 year-old who is considering starting a dance club in my local urban area which allows 18+ patrons. I'm going to take a class on entrepreneurship next semester, but I was curious if you guys had any advice on how to get this all started. I was thinking market research to see if it was even worth pursuing?

WRITING.TITLE: A group which contains a physicist, a priest, a doctor, psychologist and an atheist are permitted to ask God 3 questions. What do they ask?
WRITING.TEXT: No follow-ups, and each of them is thinking only in terms of their designated title within the group (ie, the physicist is only thinking in terms of physics).
